name: Nightscout
description: Nightscout is an open source, DIY project that allows real time access to a CGM data via personal website, smartwatch watchers, or apps and widgets available for smartphones.

notes.text: Nightscout requires configuring `my.env` with your Mongo connection string and API_SECRET. Default API_SECRET is `yoursecret123`.
Nightscout requires HTTPS for many features (security, tokens, PWA). Usage of a reverse proxy (e.g. Nginx Proxy Manager) is highly recommended.
